2025-12-29.content: Support for OS image `SLES12SP5SAP` on Bare Metal Solution is now deprecated. For information, see [Available OS images](https://docs.cloud.google.com/bare-metal/docs/bms-planning#available_os_images).

summary.title: SLES12SP5SAP Deprecated on Bare Metal Solution
summary.summary: Support for the SLES12SP5SAP OS image on Bare Metal Solution has been deprecated. Please refer to the documentation for available OS images.
